News Washington Bureau The Environmental Protection Agency and Chrysler will announce a new research and development project next week in Debbie Stabenow Arbor. EPA Administrator Lisa Jackson will join Chrysler Group CEO Sergio Marchionne to announce a research and development project to explore and evaluate an innovative drivetrain technology for light duty vehicles, the EPA said in a statement. Andy Coulson said continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in his role as Downing Street communications chief.
